|cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256FHT2I-90Q |fla2=512 |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MT29F4G08ABADA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16FP-DH |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM943460MC |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460;BCM43460KMLG, TE1335, P20, 313917, 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM943431MC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43431;BCM43431, TE1335, P21, 314018, 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612EB1;BCM54162E, B1KMLG, TE1321, P21, 290119, 3 W; |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=BCM54612EB1;BCM54162E, B1KMLG, TE1321, P21, 290119, 3 W; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;3300-E2K, A1317AC13, 317RVGA, SCMMY;1; |flags=enterprise class |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=70:72:CF |oui_eth=70:72:CF }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Dual-Band Wireless Enterprise Cloud Based Indoor Access Point}} :[http://www.edge-core.com/ProdDtl.asp?sno=479&ECW7210-L Product page] (Project Only)
*"P/N: 142000001000A REV: 0A" appears to be silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. *"P/N: 142000001005A REV: 0A" is silkscreened on the 2.4 GHz wireless module in the FCC photos. :A label affixed to the module indicates the parent [[Accton]] model is EAP1018FB.
The 70:72:CF OUI used in this entry is per the MAC label affixed to the FCC EUT's board. :It may not be used (or may not be used by the wireless IFs).
==Probable included PSU(s)== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is an :''Asian Power Devices'' WA-30B12FU.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Asian Power Devices |model=WA-30B12FU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2.5 |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |style=large, vertical |manuf_country=China }}
